item.title: Trump says Britain is 'making a very big mistake' with windfall tax on North Sea oil producers
item.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Friday called on Britain to "open up" the North Sea and get rid of "windmills."

item.title: European stocks pull back; autos stocks fall over 1%
item.description: European markets were lower on Friday after a rocky start to 2025 for stocks around the world.

item.title: Chinese stock market slump deepens with bond yields hitting record lows as PBOC reportedly signals rate cuts
item.description: Economic data on tap appeared thin on Friday, while investors in Asia continue to assess China's monetary easing policy, political chaos in South Kore...

item.title: South Korean president defies arrest in standoff with officials over martial law order
item.description: Authorities suspended the execution of the warrant for impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol after facing resistance from his security detail at his resid...

item.title: 'Unprecedented': The most punctual global airline last year was 'absolutely' a surprise, analytics firm CEO says
item.description: Aeromexico, Saudia and Delta Air Lines were the most on-time global airlines in 2024, according to a report by aviation company Cirium.
